column2: good morning everybody.    Yes are you ready?    Yes.    Yes.    Yes.    Ja.    Yes.    Just hang on one second let me – your voice might be low for the transcribers so try and speak up.    Do not worry you are tall.    Ja.    Okay no that is fine.  Today’s witness was going to be Mr Nkwinti former Minister is that right?    Yes.  Good morning Mr Nkwinti can you hear me?    Yes.    Okay thank you very much for availing Page 5 of 5yourself to assist the commission.    Yes.    Thank you.  We – I am going to adjourn for a short time because counsel wishes to look into certain matters and – and discuss certain issues with you and the investigators and then we are going to resume when she is ready.  It should not be a long time.  You understand that?  Mr Nkwinti did you hear me?    Okay alright.     Okay.    We adjourn.    Ja.

column1: ADV BALOYI SC:  Good morning Chair.    Yes thank you Chairperson.    Chairperson this morning we are – we are supposed to commence with the evidence of the land reform work stream and as I understand it this is the veryfirst witness who is going to testify.    Now he – we – I – we have an affidavit and we have a bundle of documents.    The affidavit was prepared by the – by the witness.    The witness himself.  The witness is available Mr Gugile Nkwinti.   But there are matters that I…    I – Chairperson I am told that I am pretending I am taller than I am actually am.  I have read it down.    Thank you Chair.  Chairperson there are as I said there are – we have an affidavit that was prepared by the witness himself.  There are matters that are raised in that affidavit in respect of which I would like the opportunity to have a brief discussion with him about them and so what I am – I am asking you Chairperson isthat you would grant me leave – we stand down.    And then I consult with the witness very briefly.  Perhaps I might even have to speak to the investigators and then as soon as I am ready I will approach you in chambers.    Yes.    Thank you.    Thank you Chair.

MR NKWINTI:  I can hear you good morning Chair.     Thank you very much.     Thank you it is an honour for me Chair thank you very much.     Thank you very much.    Chairperson thank you.     Thank you (inaudible).
